links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,12
prog: (PARI) { n=0; for (m=1, 530, if (isprime(a=m*4^m - 1), write("b060425.txt", n++, " ", a)); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 04 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Apr 05 2001
extensions: More terms from Reiner Martin (reinermartin(AT)hotmail.com), Jul 20 2001
